Articles.Content:
Hi! This is a little UFO style SSTO, if you want enjoy a little trip to kerbin orbit, then maybe this is the SSTO for you!

But... words are not needed... just take some photos!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

OWNER MANUAL

controls:

1 toggle jet engine

2 toggle rocket engines

4 deploy landing parachute

0 toggle ladder

How to reach orbit:

EVA ur kerbal up on the ladder and click on the little piece of the seat you can see on the top of UFO, then click: "board", enable SAS and RCS (keep always enabled), press STAGE and decouple the launcher, fire the jet engine and activate for 1 second rockets too (only 1 sec needed for separate UFO from launcher); then fly with only jet engine with an angle of 30, when you reach about 16km use an angle of 45 and 75 when at > 20km. If you do all fine then you should have a speed of 1400-1500m/s sufficient to reach 70km. At this pont do a normal orbiting manouver. use parachute for landing.

IT'S MORE EASY THAN YOU THINK.

DOWNLOAD

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ufo-ssto/
As soon as I saw this, and the Kerbal's head poking out, I laughed so hard! Good build. I would, though, like to see that land on the Mun!
Sadly, it probably won't work with FAR... otherwise really nice!

As soon as I saw this, and the Kerbal's head poking out, I laughed so hard! Good build. I would, though, like to see that land on the Mun!

there is a lander version for duna, can work for mun too...

Duna lander-flyer based on my UFO SSTO

controls:

1 toggle engines

4 deploy safety parachute

0 toggle ladder

Javascript is disabled. View full album

download

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ufo-lander-flyer/
